title: This "win a game against Pyke" mission is borderline impossible
body: Character is an auto win for the team that locks him.

replies.body:
You have to win as, against, or with him.

If you're so certain it's an autowin, just play him.

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rXs2Xc1R,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-06-01T20:53:44.297+0000)
>
> You have to win as, against, or with him.
> 
> If you're so certain it's an autowin, just play him.

Hey now rich boy, not all of us can afford every champion in the game. Would that I could I'd absolutely just play him in PvE to get it over with. 4 suffering games against him is another story.
I've been stomping on him so much ever since his release. Apparently his kit only looks good on paper.
If he was such a free win he would have a stupidly high winrate which he does not.
He's been an auto-loss for me lol, but for some reason I win when there's two
Yeah, Iâ€™ve already won one game against a Pyke. Just play ARAMs, you get it soon enough.
Pyke currently has a shit winrate
Im pretty sure that is not true. Have you tried Leona? His counter? Or any other tanky heavy cc champs

> [{quoted}](name=Piero Isbad,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rXs2Xc1R,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-01T20:45:46.358+0000)
>
> Im pretty sure that is not true. Have you tried Leona? His counter? Or any other tanky heavy cc champs

Leona mid seems really bad into him, and she can't help from the support role without ridiculous vision control in the river.
Pyke mid is *also* terrible. You have better odds winning as Sona jungle than that.

> [{quoted}](name=PopcornBunni,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rXs2Xc1R,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-01T21:29:45.397+0000)

> Leona mid seems really bad into him, and she can't help from the support role without ridiculous vision control in the river.

wait.. you're losing to him mid??
